title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
introduction: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: Licorice Pizza
introduction: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

title: Dune
introduction: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

title: CODA
introduction: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music by wanting to go to Berklee College of Music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
introduction: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

title: West Side Story
introduction: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

title: The Dark Knight
introduction: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Avengers: Endgame
introduction: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Interstellar
introduction: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Once Upon a Time... In Hollywood
introduction: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
introduction: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Gentlemen
introduction: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

title: Knives Out
introduction: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
introduction: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
introduction: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

title: Parasite
introduction: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Get Out
introduction: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
introduction: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Joker
introduction: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

title: The Notebook
introduction: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

title: Deadpool
introduction: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: Inception
introduction: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Wind River
introduction: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

title: Inglourious Basterds
introduction: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
introduction: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

title: Blade Runner 2049
introduction: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Avatar
introduction: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Warrior
introduction: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

title: Pride & Prejudice
introduction: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

title: Requiem for a Dream
introduction: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Prisoners
introduction: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

title: Gone Girl
introduction: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

title: American Psycho
introduction: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
introduction: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
introduction: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Gladiator
introduction: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Batman Begins
introduction: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

title: The Hangover
introduction: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

title: Watchmen
introduction: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

title: Whiplash
introduction: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
introduction: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Big Short
introduction: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

title: Django Unchained
introduction: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

title: Little Women
introduction: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
introduction: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: The Mitchells vs the Machines
introduction: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
introduction: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

title: Sicario
introduction: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

title: The Prestige
introduction: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Father
introduction: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
introduction: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: The Departed
introduction: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

title: Shutter Island
introduction: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: Call Me by Your Name
introduction: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
introduction: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
introduction: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

title: Deadpool 2
introduction: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

title: No Country for Old Men
introduction: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Jojo Rabbit
introduction: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: There Will Be Blood
introduction: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
introduction: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
introduction: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
introduction: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
introduction: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
introduction: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: Moana
introduction: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

title: Donnie Darko
introduction: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
introduction: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Hamilton
introduction: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
introduction: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
introduction: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
introduction: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

title: Straight Outta Compton
introduction: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles, California, in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes Hip Hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

title: The Social Network
introduction: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: Green Book
introduction: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: The Avengers
introduction: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Logan
introduction: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: Iron Man
introduction: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: The Hunt
introduction: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
introduction: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

title: Hell or High Water
introduction: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

title: Train to Busan
introduction: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

title: The Revenant
introduction: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
introduction: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

title: The Martian
introduction: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

title: The Irishman
introduction: Hitman Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family.

title: Black Hawk Down
introduction: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.

title: Dunkirk
introduction: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
introduction: As Harry, Ron, and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

title: About Time
introduction: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: La La Land
introduction: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
introduction: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

title: Despicable Me
introduction: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
introduction: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

title: Black Swan
introduction: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".

title: The Imitation Game
introduction: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

title: Old Boy
introduction: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Brokeback Mountain
introduction: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

title: Captain America: Civil War
introduction: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

title: Catch Me If You Can
introduction: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Memento
introduction: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: Spirited Away
introduction: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Stardust
introduction: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

title: Almost Famous
introduction: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

title: Another Round
introduction: Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

title: Drive
introduction: An action drama about a mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic who moonlights as a getaway driver, and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

title: Serenity
introduction: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

title: Ex Machina
introduction: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

title: Arrival
introduction: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Her
introduction: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Into the Wild
introduction: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

title: The Hateful Eight
introduction: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

title: Coco
introduction: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Blue Is the Warmest Colour
introduction: Adèle's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Adèle grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

title: The Pianist
introduction: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: Midnight in Paris
introduction: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
introduction: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

title: Zootopia
introduction: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Casino Royale
introduction: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

title: Moneyball
introduction: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

title: 12 Years a Slave
introduction: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: Star Trek
introduction: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

title: Amélie
introduction: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
introduction: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

title: Soul
introduction: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
introduction: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: Snatch
introduction: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: Silver Linings Playbook
introduction: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

title: City of God
introduction: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
introduction: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

title: X-Men: First Class
introduction: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

title: Little Miss Sunshine
introduction: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
introduction: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

title: A Star Is Born
introduction: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Hidden Figures
introduction: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
introduction: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

title: The Handmaiden
introduction: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: Atonement
introduction: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

title: Nightcrawler
introduction: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

title: The Help
introduction: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

title: True Grit
introduction: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

title: Mulholland Drive
introduction: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
introduction: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: Blood Diamond
introduction: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

title: Skyfall
introduction: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
introduction: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
introduction: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

title: The Intouchables
introduction: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Ratatouille
introduction: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: Hot Fuzz
introduction: A skilled London police officer, after irritating superiors with his embarrassing effectiveness, is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, as a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

title: Ford v Ferrari
introduction: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Zodiac
introduction: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

title: 500 Days of Summer
introduction: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
introduction: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

title: Remember the Titans
introduction: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

title: Road to Perdition
introduction: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: Dark Waters
introduction: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
introduction: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

title: The Last Samurai
introduction: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

title: Marriage Story
introduction: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

title: A Beautiful Mind
introduction: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

title: Wonder
introduction: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

title: Up
introduction: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
introduction: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: Your Name.
introduction: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

title: Ocean's Eleven
introduction: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Inside Man
introduction: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

title: Inside Out
introduction: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: V for Vendetta
introduction: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V," plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
introduction: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

title: Apocalypto
introduction: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

title: Room
introduction: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

title: Downfall
introduction: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

title: Tangled
introduction: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
introduction: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

title: Incendies
introduction: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

title: The Butterfly Effect
introduction: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

title: Sin City
introduction: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

title: The Incredibles
introduction: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: In the Mood for Love
introduction: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

title: Gran Torino
introduction: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

title: Spotlight
introduction: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
introduction: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

title: The Blind Side
introduction: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

title: Shrek
introduction: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: Star Trek Into Darkness
introduction: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

title: Man on Fire
introduction: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Training Day
introduction: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Finding Nemo
introduction: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: WALL·E
introduction: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: The Royal Tenenbaums
introduction: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

title: The Bourne Identity
introduction: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

title: Cast Away
introduction: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Rush
introduction: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

title: Big Fish
introduction: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
introduction: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

title: Argo
introduction: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

title: What We Do in the Shadows
introduction: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
introduction: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

title: Capernaum
introduction: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

title: Toy Story 4
introduction: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
introduction: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

title: Lost in Translation
introduction: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

title: Children of Men
introduction: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

title: Memories of Murder
introduction: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: Crash
introduction: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: The Fighter
introduction: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

title: Captain Fantastic
introduction: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

title: Taken
introduction: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

title: Saw
introduction: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

title: The Lives of Others
introduction: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: Shaun of the Dead
introduction: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
introduction: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

title: Minority Report
introduction: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

title: American Gangster
introduction: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

title: The Florida Project
introduction: Set over one summer, the film follows precocious six-year-old Moonee as she courts mischief and adventure with her ragtag playmates and bonds with her rebellious but caring mother, all while living in the shadows of Walt Disney World.

title: Big Hero 6
introduction: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: Monsters, Inc.
introduction: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: Mystic River
introduction: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

title: Dallas Buyers Club
introduction: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

title: Manchester by the Sea
introduction: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
introduction: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
introduction: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
introduction: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: The Machinist
introduction: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

title: Just Mercy
introduction: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

title: Gravity
introduction: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: The King's Speech
introduction: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
introduction: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

title: The Invisible Guest
introduction: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
introduction: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

title: Walk the Line
introduction: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

title: Sound of Metal
introduction: A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into freefall when he begins to lose his hearing.

title: Gifted
introduction: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.

title: Moon
introduction: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

title: District 9
introduction: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

title: The Skin I Live In
introduction: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

title: Life of Pi
introduction: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

title: And Your Mother Too
introduction: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
introduction: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

title: The Theory of Everything
introduction: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
introduction: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

title: Million Dollar Baby
introduction: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

title: Boyhood
introduction: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

title: Mr. Nobody
introduction: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

title: End of Watch
introduction: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

title: I Saw the Devil
introduction: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

title: Toy Story 3
introduction: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Match Point
introduction: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

title: Gone Baby Gone
introduction: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

title: Wreck-It Ralph
introduction: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

title: The Bourne Supremacy
introduction: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
introduction: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: The Raid: Redemption
introduction: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
introduction: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

title: Isle of Dogs
introduction: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
introduction: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

title: Let the Right One In
introduction: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

title: In Bruges
introduction: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

title: Coraline
introduction: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: The Great Beauty
introduction: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

title: Before Sunset
introduction: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

title: A Silent Voice: The Movie
introduction: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

title: Billy Elliot
introduction: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

title: Roma
introduction: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
introduction: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Before Midnight
introduction: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

title: The Lego Movie
introduction: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

title: The Others
introduction: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

title: Captain Phillips
introduction: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

title: Changeling
introduction: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins (Angelina Jolie) takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when it tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

title: This Is England
introduction: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

title: Dogville
introduction: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
introduction: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six year old daughter. Prison will be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie Miracle in Cell No. 7 (2013).

title: A Separation
introduction: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

title: Wild Tales
introduction: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

title: Detachment
introduction: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
introduction: Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.

title: Seven Pounds
introduction: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

title: The Wrestler
introduction: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

title: Battle Royale
introduction: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

title: Talk to Her
introduction: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

title: Paddington 2
introduction: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
introduction: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: Only the Brave
introduction: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

title: Searching
introduction: After his teenage daughter goes missing, a desperate father tries to find clues on her laptop.

title: The Best Offer
introduction: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

title: Adaptation.
introduction: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

title: Eastern Promises
introduction: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

title: Togo
introduction: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run despite being considered too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

title: Ip Man
introduction: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

title: Perfect Strangers
introduction: Seven long-time friends meet for dinner. They decide to share their text messages, emails and phone calls. Secrets are unveiled. Harmony trembles.

title: The Man from Earth
introduction: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

title: Sing Street
introduction: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
introduction: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: Once
introduction: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

title: The Raid 2
introduction: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

title: Lucky Number Slevin
introduction: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

title: Klaus
introduction: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
introduction: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

title: Hotel Rwanda
introduction: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

title: Amores perros
introduction: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

title: A Very Long Engagement
introduction: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

title: Flipped
introduction: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

title: The Artist
introduction: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Mommy
introduction: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

title: Ponyo
introduction: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

title: A Man Called Ove
introduction: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

title: Cinderella Man
introduction: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

title: 21 Grams
introduction: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

title: Ray
introduction: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

title: 25th Hour
introduction: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

title: Black Book
introduction: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

title: God's Own Country
introduction: Spring. Yorkshire. Young farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path.

title: The Last King of Scotland
introduction: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

title: Wolfwalkers
introduction: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

title: The Wind Rises
introduction: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

title: I Am Sam
introduction: A mentally handicapped man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.

title: Hero
introduction: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

title: Dancer in the Dark
introduction: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

title: Shoplifters
introduction: A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

title: Finding Neverland
introduction: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

title: Short Term 12
introduction: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

title: Nebraska
introduction: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
introduction: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

title: Mother
introduction: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

title: Mysterious Skin
introduction: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

title: Letters from Iwo Jima
introduction: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

title: The Body
introduction: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

title: Amour
introduction: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
introduction: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

title: Beasts of No Nation
introduction: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

title: Victoria
introduction: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
introduction: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
introduction: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

title: Mary and Max
introduction: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

title: The Station Agent
introduction: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

title: Evil
introduction: A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.

title: Paprika
introduction: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

title: Pride
introduction: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

title: The Man from Nowhere
introduction: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

title: Loving Vincent
introduction: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh (Robert Gulaczyk) to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

title: Good Bye Lenin!
introduction: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

title: Waking Life
introduction: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

title: The Chaser
introduction: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

title: Kubo and the Two Strings
introduction: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

title: Infernal Affairs
introduction: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

title: Philomena
introduction: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

title: The Salesman
introduction: While both participating in a production of "Death of a Salesman," a teacher's wife is assaulted in her new home, which leaves him determined to find the perpetrator over his wife's traumatized objections.

title: Control
introduction: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
introduction: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
introduction: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

title: The White Ribbon
introduction: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

title: A Prophet
introduction: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.

title: 3-Iron
introduction: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

title: The Sea Inside
introduction: The factual story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a 28 year campaign in favour of euthanasia and his own right to die.

title: Leviathan
introduction: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
introduction: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

title: When Marnie Was There
introduction: Due to 12 y.o. Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie.

title: Lilya 4-Ever
introduction: Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Russia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with Andrej, who is going to Sweden, and invites Lilja to come along and start a new life.

title: The Triplets of Belleville
introduction: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

title: Wolf Children
introduction: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

title: Song of the Sea
introduction: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

title: Adam's Apples
introduction: A neo-Nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devoted minister.

title: The Little Prince
introduction: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
introduction: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

title: Elite Squad
introduction: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

title: Land of Mine
introduction: In post-World War II Denmark, a group of young German POWs are forced to clear a beach of thousands of land mines under the watch of a Danish Sergeant who slowly learns to appreciate their plight.

title: I, Daniel Blake
introduction: After surviving a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight bureaucratic forces to receive Employment and Support Allowance.

title: The Motorcycle Diaries
introduction: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

title: Head-On
introduction: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

title: Darbareye Elly
introduction: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

title: Persepolis
introduction: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

title: Winter Sleep
introduction: A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

title: The World's Fastest Indian
introduction: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
introduction: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

title: The Experiment
introduction: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

title: Departures
introduction: A newly unemployed cellist takes a job preparing the dead for funerals.

title: In America
introduction: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

title: Tokyo Godfathers
introduction: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

title: Confessions
introduction: A psychological thriller of a grieving mother turned cold-blooded avenger with a twisty master plan to pay back those who were responsible for her daughter's death.

title: Loveless
introduction: A couple going through a divorce must team up to find their son who has disappeared during one of their bitter arguments.

title: Dara of Jasenovac
introduction: Follows the story of a young girl named Dara who is sent to a concentration camp in Croatia during World War 2.

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
introduction: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

title: My Sassy Girl
introduction: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

title: The Secret of Kells
introduction: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

title: Celda 211
introduction: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

title: Frost/Nixon
introduction: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

title: The Past
introduction: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

title: Nobody Knows
introduction: In a small Tokyo apartment, twelve-year-old Akira must care for his younger siblings after their mother leaves them and shows no sign of returning.

title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
introduction: When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.

title: My Father and My Son
introduction: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

title: The Chorus
introduction: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

title: After the Wedding
introduction: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

title: Joint Security Area
introduction: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

title: 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days
introduction: A woman assists her friend in arranging an illegal abortion in 1980s Romania.

title: The Magdalene Sisters
introduction: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
introduction: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

title: G.O.R.A.
introduction: A slick young Turk kidnapped by extraterrestrials shows his great « humanitarian spirit » by outwitting the evil commander-in-chief of the planet of G.O.R.A.

title: The Return
introduction: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

title: Joyeux Noel
introduction: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

title: No Man's Land
introduction: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

title: In a Better World
introduction: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

title: Nine Queens
introduction: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

title: Millennium Actress
introduction: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

title: Elite Squad 2: The Enemy Within
introduction: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

title: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
introduction: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

title: Tangerines
introduction: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

title: C.R.A.Z.Y.
introduction: A young French Canadian, one of five boys in a conservative family in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging identity with his father's values.

title: Vera Drake
introduction: Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.

title: The Edge of Heaven
introduction: A Turkish man travels to Istanbul to find the daughter of his father's former girlfriend.

title: De ademtocht
introduction: Story of 40-man Turkish task force who must defend a relay station.

title: Vizontele
introduction: Lives of residents in a small, Anatolian village change when television is introduced to them.
